mapper.select: SELECT user_id, provider, provider_id, profile_image, name, refresh_token, fcm_token, birthyear, gender, email, role, weight, height, position, region_code, created_at, updated_at FROM tbl_user_bais WHERE provider = #{provider} AND provider_id = #{providerId}

SELECT user_id, provider, provider_id, profile_image, name, refresh_token, fcm_token, birthyear, gender, email, role, weight, height, position, region_code, created_at, updated_at FROM tbl_user_bais WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user_id, provider, provider_id, profile_image, name, refresh_token, fcm_token, birthyear, gender, email, role, weight, height, position, region_code, created_at, updated_at FROM tbl_user_bais WHERE refresh_token = #{refreshToken}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user_bais ( provider, provider_id, name, profile_image, email, birthyear, gender, role, weight, height, refresh_token, fcm_token, position, region_code, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{name}, #{profileImage}, #{email}, #{birthYear}, #{gender}, #{role}, #{weight}, #{height}, #{refreshToken}, #{fcmToken}, #{position}, #{regionCode}, NOW(), NOW() )
